actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-43.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #55 (268-127).

official_title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations, studies, oversight, and functions to be conducted by the Committee on Government Operations.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-43) Authorizes expenditures, not to exceed $2,093,500, by the House Committee on Government Operations for investigations, studies, oversight responsibilities, and committee functions. Terminates the authorization granted by this resolution on January 3, 1980.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the expenses of investigations, studies, oversight, and functions to be conducted by the Committee on Government Operations.
